source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH TaskData AS (
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T.[Name]) AS TaakregelKey, -- Unieke primaire sleutel
        T.[Krow__Account__c],
        T.[Krow__Status__c] AS TaakStatus,
        T.[Krow__Task_Type__c] AS TaakType,
        T.[Name] AS TaakNaam,
        T.[Krow__Project_Task_Order__c] AS Taakregel,
        T.Id as TaakregelId,
        T.[Krow__Billable__c] AS IsFacturabel,
        NULL AS DirectIndirect,
        NULL AS Uurtype,
        T.[Krow__Task_Start_Date__c] AS Begindatum,
        T.[Krow__Task_Due_Date__c] AS Einddatum,
        T.[Krow__Completion_Date__c] AS DatumAfgerond,
        NULL AS IsVooruitbetaald,
        T.[Krow__Total_Hours_Logged__c] AS TotaalGeschrevenUren,
        T.[Krow__Estimated_Hours__c] AS TotaalGeschatteUren,
        T.[Krow__Project_Task_Order__c] AS Taakvolgorde,
        P.[ProjectKey] AS ProjectKey,
        K.[KlantKey]
    FROM [s2_stg_salesforce].[Task] T
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimProjecten] P
        ON T.[Krow__Project__c] = P.[ProjectId]
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimKlanten] K
        ON T.[Krow__Account__c] = K.[KlantID]
)
SELECT 
    TaakregelKey,
    TaakregelId,
    TaakStatus,
    TaakType,
    TaakNaam,
    Taakregel,
    IsFacturabel,
    DirectIndirect,
    Uurtype,
    Begindatum,
    Einddatum,
    DatumAfgerond,
    IsVooruitbetaald,
    TotaalGeschrevenUren,
    TotaalGeschatteUren,
    Taakvolgorde,
    ProjectKey,
    KlantKey
FROM TaskData;
